abstract: Bank of America’s embattled chief executive, Kenneth D. Lewis, will not receive a salary or bonus for 2009.
snippet: Bank of America’s embattled chief executive, Kenneth D. Lewis, will not receive a salary or bonus for 2009.
lead_paragraph: Bowing to increasing scrutiny of his compensation, Bank of America’s embattled chief executive, Kenneth D. Lewis, agreed Thursday not to take a salary or bonus for 2009, The New York Times’s Louise Story and Eric Dash report.

headline.main: Vanishing Act: BofA’s Lewis Loses His Paycheck
